授業目的: 本講義は、国際関係学を学んだことのある受講生を対象に、主要な理論を学び、国際関係学において中心的な議論となる諸テーマへを理解し、国際政治における様々な事象に対する独自の視点を養成する事を目的とする。
到達目標:
以下の諸点を授業の目標として設定しています。
・国際政治学の主な理論を理解する。
・国際政治学の、学問上の主要な議論や問いを学び、独自の分析を行う力をつける。
授業方法:
This　class will be conducted interactively via Zoom. Those who wish to take this course are required to register between April 1 and 3. 備考　Note
The course has the following three sets of requirements:

1. Regular class attendance and active participation in discussions based on the required readings.
2. Several written summary/analysis papers and in-class oral reports. (The number of papers/reports will depend on the number of students who register for this course. Each student will sign up for several required weekly readings, prepare papers, and orally report them in class. The papers must include both a summary of the assigned readings and the student's own reactions to them that are not mere impressions but are based on a thoughtful analysis.
3. Performance in three debate sessions
４．Final examination

Course grades will be calculated in the following manner:

Class attendance and participation 15%
Several in-class oral reports 15%
Several written summary/analysis papers 15%
Debate (10% each) 30%
Final examination 25%
